underlying_goal: To update the dotfiles repository to include and standardize the use of modern, efficient CLI tools (like fzf, zoxide, delta) as replacements for older ones.
primary_success: Identified a critical gap where a tool (fzf) was used in scripts but not installed, and led a comprehensive, multi-file update to modernize the entire CLI toolchain.
brief_summary: User wanted to adopt modern CLI tools. Claude analyzed the current setup, identified gaps, and led a detailed discussion on which tools to add (fzf, zoxide, delta) and which to skip. It then updated the install scripts, configs, and aliases, including adding cargo-based fallbacks for no-sudo environments, and gitignored cache directories.
